name: Civets Coffee
description:
A small little 3D platformer developed by the CSUMB Game Developer's Club of Spring 2022

Project Management - Arthur, Clover, Val, and Noel

Micah- Concept art and UI

Bianca- 3D Design/Art (Character Design)

Corinne- 3D Design/Art

Theo- Concept Art

Val-UI Design Clover- 3D Design/Art (Level Design)

Arthur - Programming, Music

Nicky - Programming
